text: Arkadiusz Szczygieł (born 21 February 1975) is a retired Polish football striker.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:GKS Katowice players Category:Rozwój Katowice players Category:Śląsk Świętochłowice players Category:Ruch Radzionków players Category:Association football forwards
title: Arkadiusz Szczygieł
